researchers_stance: Additional run confirms improving conversion trajectory under the specified audience constraints.
exec_summary: This constrained run reached majority conversion-confidence by V6 with reduced dealbreaker rates.
findings:
• Core framing held: reducing scroll without deletion remained persuasive.
  • Trust controls adoption: privacy and proof language continue to influence uptake.
recommendations:
1. Keep mechanism explicit.
  2. Add stronger evidence and privacy defaults.
qualitative_themes:
• Middle path beats bans.
  • Social accountability needs trust.
clarity_notes: Clarity improved round-over-round, with V6 skewing toward nailed_it.
